settings.title: JOIN OUR TEAM
settings.text:
Margot Elena Companies & Collections, a creatively driven, trendsetting industry leader, produces beautiful indie bath, body, and lifestyle brands. Our brands include Lollia, TokyoMilk, TokyoMilk Dark, TokyoMilk Light, Library of Flowers, Love and Toast, and The Cottage Greenhouse.

We’re also known for being an Employer of Choice in Colorado.

settings.title: True to our mission
settings.text:
From our inception over 25 years ago, we’ve held true to our mission to inspire infinite beauty. In doing so, we committed to building inspirational brands, and creating a community that fosters:

  • Creativity
  • Innovation
  • Collaboration
  • Integrity

settings.title: Your Benefits
settings.text: Medical, Dental, Vision, 401K planEmployer Paid Telehealth Service, Paid Time Off and Paid Holidays, Employer Sponsored Employee Assistance Program, Financial Planning, Mental Health Support Services, and more!

settings.title: LET’S MAKE BEAUTY MORE BEAUTIFUL TOGETHER
settings.text:
If Margot Elena Companies & Collections sounds like a good fit for your professional talents, we'd love to hear from you!

Please see all open positions on our career page. 

If we do not currently list an opening appropriate for your specific expertise, please feel free to submit a resume and cover letter to HR@margotelena.com for future consideration.
